headline.print_headline: A Push for Payments If Oil Exports Drop
headline.seo: Saudis Seek Compensation if Oil Exports Fall
headline.main: Saudis Seek Payments for Any Drop in Oil Revenues

byline.original: By JAD MOUAWAD and ANDREW C. REVKIN

docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi officials reiterated a call for oil-producing countries to be compensated if rich nations reduce their consumption, in advance of negotiations in December.
docs.snippet: Saudi officials reiterated a call for oil-producing countries to be compensated if rich nations reduce their consumption, in advance of negotiations in December.
